author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: The Euro Slide Feels Like Déjà Vu - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: A year ago this week, the election of French President Emmanuel Macron eased concerns about rising political instability in Europe, and helped clear the way for a monthslong euro rally. So much for that. The euro is sliding again, down 3.4% against the dollar over the past month and 1.2% for the year. On Tuesday, one euro bought How Will U.S. Sanctions Against Iran Play Out This Time?—Energy Journal Next Stocks to Watch: Walmart, Facebook, Disney, EA, ConocoPhillips, Papa John's, ADT, TripAdvisor
